articles.title: Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Saturday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, regional secretary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and President of Syria, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria. 
					 The message said:
					
					I extend warm congratulations to you and the friendly government and people of the Syrian Arab Republic on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria. 
					
					The March 8 revolution was the historic event which helped the Syrian people open up the road for achieving great success and development in all fields of politics, economy and culture under the leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party.
					
					I, availing myself of this opportunity, express belief that the traditional bond of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples would continue to develop in conformity with the common interests and sincerely wish you good health and happiness and your friendly people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, President of Syria, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries formed and developed in the road of anti-imperialist joint struggle would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, and sincerely wished the president greater success in his noble work for realizing the Arab unity and cohesion, ensuring the peace and security in the Middle East and defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves against Inter-Korean Cooperation under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves against Inter-Korean Cooperation under Fire
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council issued a statement Saturday denouncing the puppet Ministry of Unification for having disallowed recently the inter-Korean cooperation projects of south Korean non-governmental organizations under the absurd pretext of "examination," "policy toward the north" and the like. 
					The statement said: This was a manifestation of undisguised anti-DPRK confrontational hysteria as it revealed the Lee Myung Bak group's treacherous and anti-reunification nature.
					
					The reality goes to prove that the Lee group's loudmouthed "sincerity" and "cooperation" are nothing but a poor trick to mislead the public opinion as it is intended to cover up its wicked intention to keep standing  against unity, reunification and common prosperity of the nation and escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					The Lee group's reckless moves for confrontation with the DPRK and a war of aggression against it totally blocked cooperation projects among non-governmental organizations, to say nothing of the relations between authorities of the north and the south, and pushed the political and military stand-off on the Korean Peninsula beyond an extreme phase, creating such a grave situation on it that a war may break out any moment.
					
					"Co-existence", "co-prosperity" and "helping each other to survive" touted by the group of traitors while working hard to do harm to fellow countrymen are an insult and intolerable mockery of the nation. 
					
					There can be neither noble cooperation between the north and the south for the prosperity common to the nation nor peace, prosperity and reunification and it will not be able to escape disasters of confrontation and war as long as the above-said group is allowed to stay in power.
					
					The Lee group will come to know well before long what dear price it will have to pay for its thrice-cursed treacherous and anti-reunification acts.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark International Women's Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark International Women's Day
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday to mark the 99th International Women's Day.
					Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of working people's organizations, women officials and labor innovators, women in the city and overseas Korean women.
					
					Present there on invitation were women of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					Ro Song Sil, chairperson of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, in her report said that international unity and solidarity among the progressive women the world over have grown stronger in the struggle to achieve national independence and sovereignty against domination and subjugation and great progress has been made in the development of the world women's movement for nearly a century since the International Women's Day was instituted.
					
					She noted that the Korean women's movement has covered the road of victory and glory in the crucible of the Korean revolution recorded with heroic events and epoch-making changes under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					Recalling that President Kim Il Sung put forward the women as the powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot and heroines of the times and adorned the history of profound trust and love, providing them with everything he could, the reporter stressed that his undying feats would shine forever. 
					
					The Korean women's movement greeted a new historic era of its development under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, she said, and went on:
					
					The Korean women are creditably discharging their mission and duty in the struggle to defend socialism and achieve the prosperity of the country, sharing the destiny with the headquarters of the revolution, thanks to Kim Jong Il's deep trust and loving care.
					
					She called upon all the women to give fullest play to the inexhaustible mental power and all potentials and thus fully demonstrate the stamina of the women of Songun Korea in the on-going drive to bring about a great revolutionary surge for opening the gate to the great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Korean Women Called upon to Demonstrate Their Revolutionary Stamina
articles.content:
Korean Women Called upon to Demonstrate Their Revolutionary Stamina 
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean women are highly proud of having grown to be dynamic forces of the revolution and construction under the leadership of the great leader and the great party.
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an editorial dedicated to the March 8 International Women's Day. 
					
					The editorial goes on:
					
					President Kim Il Sung founded the Democratic Women's Union of Korea right after the liberation of the country and promulgated the Law on Equality of Sexes. This was a historic event that brought about a radical turn in the social position and role of the Korean women and their political life.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il authored many works including "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction," clearly indicating the way to be followed by the Korean women's movement and training women as the steadfast revolutionaries of the era amidst the tempest of the Songun revolution.
					
					It was thanks to his energetic leadership and warm loving care that the function and role of the women's union organizations as ones for the ideological education have been steadily increased and the Korean women have steadfastly advanced along the road of Songun and socialism under the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Admirable, indeed, are the ideological and moral traits of the Korean women who enjoy a worthwhile life under the care of the great leader and the great party.
					
					It is the noble ideological and moral world of the Korean women to devote themselves to the struggle for the prosperity of the country, reposing absolute trust in the party and the leader in any adversity. The shining victories of the Songun revolution and structures that have sprung up everywhere in the country are associated with the feats performed by the Korean women, remaining single-mindedly true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The WPK and the Korean people are highly proud of having a large contingent of women revolutionaries who have absolute trust in their leader and a revolutionary outlook on life that one should live not merely for today but for tomorrow.
					
					The editorial calls upon all the women to fully demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women in the fruitful drive to open the gate to a thriving nation under Songun leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean Women Full of Pride
articles.content:
Korean Women Full of Pride
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean women are celebrating the International Women's Day with significance.
					Seen everywhere in the country are the reliable features of women replete with happiness and optimism.
					
					After the liberation of the country President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the Law on Sex Equality was promulgated on July 30, 1946, thus making all the women exercise equal rights with men in all fields.
					
					The women in the DPRK are a reliable force which is respected duly and is pushing one of the wheels of revolution.
					
					Plenty of women are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) who discuss the state's affairs, officials of people's government bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments and co-op farms, heroines, professors, doctors, famous stars and ace athletes.
					
					Hundreds of thousands of women scientists, technicians and specialists are doing their bits in various sectors of the national economy.
					
					The proportion of women among deputies to the SPA is 20.1 percent and lots of women are working as deputies to the provincial, city and county people's assemblies.
					
					The government guarantees by law the women's socio-political life, exercise of rights and interests through the Socialist Labor Law, the Law on the Public Health and the Family Law and ensures the thorough implementation of the laws.
					
					In particular the women are afforded great state benefits including the paid maternity leave, the working day for the female workers with three and more children is six hours and all the children are brought up in nurseries and kindergartens at the expense of state and society. 
					
					There is the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, mass political organization of the women.
					
					Since it joined the Women's International Democratic Federation in October of Juche 35 (1946), the union has constantly expanded and developed the cooperative relations with progressive women's organizations of various countries under the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Pak Hyon Suk, One of World Best Ten Weight-lifters
articles.content:
Pak Hyon Suk, One of World Best Ten Weight-lifters
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Hyon Suk, weight-lifter of the Amnokgang Sports Team of the DPRK was selected as one of the best ten weight-lifters of the world women's weightlifting in the vote of selecting the best players for Juche 97 (2008).
					The International Weightlifting Federation initiated the nomination of male and female best players through its website at the end of the year of 2008 and held the vote, the first of its kind.
					
					Pak Hyon Suk lifted 106kg in snatch and 135kg in jerk, total 241kg with rapid lifting and attachment movement in the 63kg category of the women's weightlifting of the 29th Olympiad and thus won a gold medal, surpassing the likely winner.
					
					Her nomination clearly shows the level of the developing weightlifting event of the DPRK.

articles.title: Undying Feats Performed in Developing and Strengthening DPRK Government
articles.content:
Undying Feats Performed in Developing and Strengthening DPRK Government
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are looking back upon the imperishable feats performed by the peerlessly great men in developing and strengthening the DPRK government into the true people's power serving the working masses on the occasion of March 8 on which the day of elections of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly falls.
					President Kim Il Sung, basing himself on precious tradition and experience accumulated in the solution of the power problem in the flames of the anti-Japanese war, established the genuine people's power after the liberation and constantly strengthened and developed it in line with the developing revolution and construction.
					
					He personally wrote the "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" and saw to it that it was adopted to proclaim the DPRK as an independent socialist state and institute a unique state machinery. As a result, the state power was further consolidated and its function and role elevated.
					
					He authored celebrated works including "Let Us Further Strengthen the Socialist System of Our Country", "Tasks of the People's Government in Modeling the Whole Society on the Juche Idea" and "Let Us Further Strengthen the People's Government". He, in the works, newly expounded that the main mode of the socialist state activities is the socialist democracy and gave perfect answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in cementing the people's power, thus converting the DPRK government into the solid and viable one rooted deeply among the popular masses.
					
					It is entirely thanks to the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that today the DPRK government is adhering invariably to its character and mission as the socialist political power in the unprecedented ordeals and difficulties.
					
					When socialism collapsed in various countries and the imperialists clamored about the "end of socialism", he published the famous work "Let's Give Fuller Play to the Advantages of Our People's Power" and thus smashed the anti-socialist moves of the enemies into smithereens.
					
					In particular, he enforced the Songun politics and let the people's power organs be strengthened in accordance with requirement of the Songun era.
					
					Therefore, in the unprecedented difficult period of the "Arduous March" and forced march  the DPRK put in force one after another social policies which were conducive to the improvement of the people's well-being and the power bodies discharged their mission fuller as householder responsible for the people's living and as protector of independent and creative life of the working masses.
					
					The prospect of the DPRK government which is strengthened and developed day by day under the Songun revolutionary leadership of      Kim Jong Il is bright and the faith and will of the Korean people to defend and shine the socialist power in any adversity are as firm as rock.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Acts of Treachery Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Acts of Treachery Assailed
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in the "2008 White Paper on Defense," the first of its kind published since it came to power, claimed that the DPRK is a "direct and serious threat" to south Korea. Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This is an act of treachery committed by the warmongers hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots and the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					The commentary cites facts to prove that it is none other than the U.S. and south Korean puppets who are posing a direct and serious threat to the peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The mission of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK is to defend the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and sovereignty and dignity of the nation, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are tasked to deal merciless blows at any aggressor seeking to infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and serve as a treasured sword guaranteeing a happy and stable life of the people.
					
					Had the DPRK not bolstered up the revolutionary armed forces under the banner of Songun, a war would have broken out on the Korean Peninsula a hundred times.
					
					The groundless charge brought by the Lee group of traitors against the DPRK is only aimed at stepping up the preparations for a war of aggression against it under that pretext.
					
					The group is made up of warmongers who are not interested in the national reconciliation and unity at all but only seek confrontation with compatriots and a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					Durable peace can never settle on the Korean Peninsula but military tension will increase day by day and, furthermore, all the fellow countrymen will fall victim to a disastrous nuclear war unless such group of traitors are eliminated.
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are closely following every move of the warmongers.
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will deal unprecedentedly merciless and strong blows at the aggressors should they ignite a war of aggression against it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Racket Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Racket Assailed
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the puppet minister of Defense let loose a spate of barbed remarks that the north's moves are freezing the inter-Korean relations and posing serious threats to the regional stability and peace and that the south would decisively cope with them, etc. Meanwhile, the coteries of the "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade" busied themselves holding "chain talks" with the U.S., Japan and other surrounding countries to ask them to apply "sanctions" and pressure" against the DPRK. 
					Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					Those remarks are nothing but sophism aimed at covering up their black-hearted nature as a disturber of the inter-Korean relations and peace.
					
					The group of traitors is clinging to the coattails of outside forces with an eye to do harm to and stifle fellow countrymen, far from opting for doing good things for the nation. Such disgusting acts clearly prove that they are steeped in the plot of treachery to the marrow of their bones with an aim to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last and realize its wild dream of "unification through invading the north" at any cost with the backing of foreign forces. 
					
					The Lee clique, driven to a tight corner at home and abroad, is hell bent on finding a way out of it in the inter-Korean confrontation and dependence on outside forces. It, however, should clearly understand that such acts would only spark off bitterer resentment of south Koreans from all walks of life and deteriorate situation and thus deepen the crisis of collapse. 
					
					Steadfast is the will of the revolutionary armed forces and people of the DPRK to counter the group of traitors' provocation with merciless punishment.
					
					If the group desperately opts for cooperation with outsiders, persistently taking issue with the DPRK, the provokers will be made to pay dearly for their crimes.
					
					The Lee group had better stop foolish acts and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Ceaseless War Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ceaseless War Exercises to Be Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet air force announced on Thursday that they would stage a joint drill in the U.S. air force base in Kunsan during Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					The U.S. 8th combat air division and the 11th combat air division of the puppet air force are going to conduct DPRK-targeted war exercises from March 9 to 12 allegedly to increase the capability of joint operation.
					
					Meanwhile, the south Korea-U.S. "combined forces command" announced that eight war exercises under various names would be opened to the press, including street warfare, mountain warfare and live firing drills to be staged across south Korea during the joint military exercises.
					
					Also, the 51st division of the puppet army is reported to stage Foal Eagle exercises in the area of Kyonggi Province from March 9 to 13.
					
					Such projected reckless war gambles aimed at invasion of the DPRK clearly show how frantically the U.S. imperialists and the puppet bellicose forces are trying to ignite a war in the Korean Peninsula at any cost.

articles.title: Stop to Projected War Exercises Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Projected War Exercises Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea, including the Solidarity for Progress, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, called a press conference in Seoul on Thursday, demanding an immediate halt to the projected anti-DPRK war exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet war maniacs.
					A press release, read out at the conference, stressed that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, large-scale joint military exercises to be staged by the U.S. and the south Korean military war hawks across south Korea from March 9, are evidently war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					It said: The U.S. is now forward-deploying Stealth fighter bombers and other offensive weapons in the Asia-Pacific region while moving its armed forces. And the Lee Myung Bak "government" is driving the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, calling for "preemptive attack" and claiming that they would "not rule out a war." If the said large-scale joint military exercises are launched under such situation, they would entail serious consequences.
					
					The release held that the DPRK-targeted war exercises should be cancelled at once as they will wreck peace and escalate the military tension in the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Action against Human Rights Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Action against Human Rights Flayed
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- At least 200 human rights organizations in Pusan, Taegu and Kwangju of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on March 2 at which they denounced the puppet authorities' unreasonable action against human rights. 
					The organizations accused the puppet Ministry of Administration and Security of instructing the "Human Rights Committee" of drastically cutting down its staff and closing its local offices and threatening to forcibly enforce the action in case it refuses to implement the instruction.
					
					Recalling that the Lee Myung Bak regime has left no means untried to render the said committee defunct since the outset of his office, the organizations held that the action is part of its moves.
					
					Noting that human rights have been crudely violated under the Lee regime, the organizations charged that the "government's" action to cut down the staff of the said committee for the mere reason that it is displeased with its activities is little short of a human rights abuse.
					
					The organizations declared that they would launch a movement in protest against the "government's" undemocratic action.

articles.title: Book Printed in Bangladesh to Commemorate Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Book Printed in Bangladesh to Commemorate Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Blits Publishing House of Bangladesh brought out book "Road to Peaceful New Century" to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					Carried in the book authored by Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, is a photo of Kim Il Sung conducting external activities.
					
					The book consists of the preface, "1. The World and Korea Today" and "2. The Brilliant Commander of Mt. Paektu and the Invincible Army".
					
					The book in its preface notes that the author was greatly fascinated by the noble personality of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il while deeply studying the Juche idea and keenly felt the originality and vitality of the Songun politics. And it stresses that people should follow the Songun politics if they want to live in peace in the new century.
					
					In "1. The World and Korea Today" the book impressively tells about the fact that the author found the path of his party in the great Juche idea after wandering about to seek after the truth and the days when he was honored with the audience of Kim Il Sung during the stay in the DPRK and received the precious teachings from the President that serve as his maxim of life.
					
					It also cites concrete facts to introduce the origin and historical roots of the Workers' Party of Korea's Songun idea and its truth and great vitality.
					
					In "2. The Brilliant Commander of Mt. Paektu and the Invincible Army" the book profoundly explains about the fact that Kim Jong Il has further strengthened the Korean People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army and the DPRK into an impregnable socialist bulwark with his unique Songun politics.
					
					It tells about the fact that Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, gave birth to Kim Jong Il and brought up him as the brilliant sun of the future, and introduces the anecdotes showing his personality as the peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Italy
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Thoroughly Establishing the System of Party Leadership" was brought out in booklet on the occasion of his birthday by the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain.
					The work, published on April 28, Juche 68 (1979), clarifies in detail the problems arising in definitely ensuring the Workers' Party of Korea's leadership over the revolution and construction, including the matter of unconditionally accepting and carrying through the Party's decisions and instructions and establishing the iron-like revolutionary discipline whereby the whole party acts as one.

articles.title: DPRK's Policy for Space Development in Peaceful Purpose Supported in India
articles.content:
DPRK's Policy for Space Development in Peaceful Purpose Supported in India
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- We hope that the Korean people would make new achievements in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation by successfully launching Kwangmyongsong-2, an experimental communications satellite, under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The All-India Forward Bloc, the All-India Youth Organization, the All-India Progressive Peasants' Union, the All-India Students' Front and the Indian Coordinating Centre of the Federation of Trade Unions stressed this in their joint statement on Feb. 26 supporting the statement issued by a spokesman for the Korean Committee of Space Technology as regards the DPRK's preparations for launching the said experimental communications satellite.
					
					Outer space is an asset common to mankind and its use for peaceful purposes has become a global trend, the joint statement said, and went on:
					
					The courageous and industrious Korean people have long and steadily pushed ahead with the work to develop the space science and technology, and succeeded in putting their first experimental satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 into orbit in August 1998.
					
					This is the victory of the WPK and the DPRK government's policy for development of outer space and its peaceful use.
					
					The statement scathingly denounced the U.S. and some other countries for making desperate moves against the DPRK and socialism, spreading the rumor about nonexistent "missile launch" of the DPRK.
					
					We express once again our support for the DPRK's policy for development of outer space and its peaceful use, the statement said.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's works were held in Bangladesh, Pakistan and Ethiopia between Feb. 18 and 20 on the occasion of the  35th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					Outlining the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy", the chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said:
					
					The world progressives including Korean people are now dynamically advancing along the road of independence under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, the brilliant successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					The world progressives should zealously learn from the indomitable fighting spirit and rich experience of the Korean people who have achieved shining successes by thoroughly embodying the Juche idea in all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					The former minister of Justice of Pakistan said that proceeding from the man-centered philosophical principle, the Juche philosophy established the social-historical outlook of Juche, the Juche-based view on social history, thus overcoming the limitations of the preceding socio-historical outlook and bringing a radical turn in the viewpoint and attitude to the social history.
					
					Kim Jong Il, who has developed in depth the Juche idea authored by President Kim Il Sung, is reliably defending Korean-style socialism from the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK with his unique Songun politics, he added.
					
					The chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il as the great philosopher, saying that his famous work "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" is an immortal work that helps have a correct understanding of the Juche philosophy.

articles.title: Projected U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
Projected U.S.-S. Korean War Exercises Flayed
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia made public a statement on March 5 in protest against the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique's moves to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					The statement recalled that the U.S. and the puppet warmongers have planned to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, large-scale joint military maneuvers for invasion of the DPRK, across south Korea from March 9 to 20 while announcing that they would round off a new "operation plan" to replace "OPLAN 5027" and apply it in the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to be staged in forthcoming August.
					
					This goes to prove that their intention to contain the northern half of Korea by force of arms and impose disasters of a nuclear war upon the Korean nation at any cost has reached the extremely dangerous phase, the statement said.
					
					The confederation and Koreans in Russia strongly demand that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities cancel at once the projected war maneuvers aimed at invading the DPRK, it said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita al presidente siriaco
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita al presidente siriaco
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, secretario regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS) y presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria con motivo del aniversario 46 de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Con motivo del aniversario 46 de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria, hago llegar a Usted y al amistoso gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Arabe de Siria mi calurosa felicitacion.
					
					La Revolucion del 8 de Marzo fue un evento historico que dejo abierto el camino capaz de lograr grandes exitos y desarrollo en todos los dominios  de la politica, la economia, la cultura bajo la direccion del partido BAAS.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresarle la conviccion de que los lazos de amistad y cooperacion tradicionales entre los pueblos de nuestros dos paises seguiran fortaleciendose conforme a los interese comunes y le deseo de todo corazon a Usted buena salud y felicidad y al amistoso pueblo de vuestro pais el mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: CRN critica a banda de Lee Myung Bak por impedir cooperacion N-S
articles.content:
CRN critica a banda de Lee Myung Bak por impedir cooperacion N-S
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos dias, el Ministerio de Reunificacion titere del Sur de Corea impide las labores de cooperacion con el Norte de las entidades civiles surcoreanas bajo pretextos absurdos como la "revision" y la "politica sobre el Norte".
					Esto constituye otra muestra de la brutal y demencial campana de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que revela la naturaleza antinacional y anti-reunificacion de la horda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Asi denuncio el portavoz del Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) en una declaracion fechada 7 y continuo:
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que la "sinceridad", la "cooperacion" y otras palabras, que pronuncia frecuentemente la horda de Lee, no pasan de ser una sucia artimana de engano a la opinion publica para encubrir el siniestro intento de perseguir unicamente la confrontacion fratricida rehusando la unidad, la reunificacion y la coprosperidad de la nacion.
					
					Hoy, debido a la imprudente campana de confrontacion con la RPDC y las maniobras de guerra contra esta, que libra la horda de Lee, tanto las relaciones entre las autoridades de ambas partes de Corea como las labores de cooperacion entre las entidades civiles fueron totalmente suspendidas.
					
					Ademas, la confrontacion politico-militar ya paso el punto limite en la Peninsula Coreana creando asi una aguda situacion que puede dar lugar a una guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					A pesar de esto, la horda de Lee habla descaradamente de "coexistencia", "coprosperidad" y "convivencia" actuando freneticamente para calumniar y danar a los compatriotas, lo cual es un insulto e imperdonable burla a todos los coreanos.
					
					Mientras existe esta banda de traidores, no habra las sagradas labores de cooperacion N-S para la prosperidad comun de la nacion ni el florecimiento pacifico ni la reunificacion. Al contrario, toda la nacion coreana sufrira los desastres de confrontacion y guerra.
					
					La horda de Lee vera en un futuro no lejano que le van a costar muy caros sus imperdonables actos antinacionales y anti-reunificacion.

articles.title: Acto central por el 8 de Marzo
articles.content:
Acto central por el 8 de Marzo
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 99o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer (el 8 de marzo).
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones de masas, las funcionarias, innovadoras laborales, mujeres capitalinas y coreanas en ultramar.
					
					Fueron invitados las mujeres de las embajadas de varios paises y de las oficinas de organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en Corea y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de la presidenta del CC de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, Ro Song Sil.
					
					Durante casi un siglo que data de la institucion del Dia Internacional de la Mujer, se consolidaron la unidad y solidaridad internacionales entre las mujeres progresistas del mundo entero en la lucha contra la dominacion y la subyugacion y por la independencia y soberania nacionales, y se logro notable avance en el desarrollo del movimiento femenino mundial, comenzo la oradora y prosiguio:
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion de los Grandes Hombres sin pares (el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il), el movimiento femenino de Corea recorrio solo el camino de victorias y glorias en el fragor de la revolucion coreana llena de eventos heroicos y cambios seculares.
					
					Seran eternas las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien formo a las mujeres como poderosa fuerza, que impulsa una rueda del coche llamado la revolucion, y como heroinas de la epoca y les dispenso todos los beneficios escribiendo la historia de infinita confianza y amor a ellas.
					
					Bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el movimiento femenino de Corea entro en la nueva fase historica de su desarrollo.
					
					Gracias a la inmensa confianza y amor del Dirigente, las mujeres coreanas cumplen satisfactoriamente su mision y deber asumidos en la lucha por defender el socialismo y lograr la prosperidad de la patria compartiendo el mismo destino con la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Todas las feminas coreanas deben emplear toda su indoblegable potencia espiritual y todas las potencialidades para manifestar plenamente el temperamento de la mujer de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar) en la lucha de hoy por producir un gran auge revolucionario para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta "Carta Blanca de Defensa Nacional" de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta "Carta Blanca de Defensa Nacional" de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- La horda de Lee Myung Bak describio a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "directa y seria amenaza" en la "Carta Blanca de Defensa Nacional de 2008", editada por primera vez despues de su acceso al poder.
					Esta definicion es un crimen antinacional de los belicistas fanaticos por la confrontacion fratricida y por provocar la guerra contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					Hay de sobra los datos reveladores de que son Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos los que amenazan directa y seriamente la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC tienen la mision de defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion.
					
					Especificamente, ellas funcionan como martillo de hierro para los agresores que traten de violar la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion y como medio omnipotente que garantiza al pueblo la vida feliz y estable.
					
					Si la RPDC no las hubiera fortalecido bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar), se habria desatado mil veces la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La horda de Lee acusa a la RPDC por razones absurdas porque necesita un pretexto para justificar sus preparativos para la guerra contra la segunda.
					
					La banda de Lee no se interesa ni un comino por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y persigue unicamente la confrontacion y la guerra contra el Norte.
					
					Antes de que fuera eliminada esta camarilla, no llegara jamas la paz duradera a la Peninsula Coreana, se fomentara cada dia mas la tension militar y todos los coreanos se convertiran en las victimas de la catastrofica guerra nuclear.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC vigilan agudamente cada movimiento de los belicistas.
					
					Si los belicistas desatan por fin la guerra contra la RPDC, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias les asestaran a los agresores un implacable y duro golpe que nunca ellos han probado antes.
